name: Rocket-X Token
description: RXT is the native governance token of the Rocket-X platform, specifically designed to support decentralized project launches and community engagement on the blockchain. It aims to provide users with a convenient Web3 investment experience while promoting a more transparent and equitable decentralized ecosystem. RXT holders are entitled to voting rights on platform projects, contribute to platform governance, pay for related transactions and services, and enjoy other exclusive benefits within the Rocket-X ecosystem.
